entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Ice pellets mixed with snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning and early this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 60 over southern sections late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over southern sections. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
